text: wadarab allah mathalana akhar lbtlan alshirk rjlyn: 'ahaduhuma akhrs asm la yafham wala yufhim, la yuqadar ealaa manfaeat nafsih 'aw ghyrh, wahu eib' thaqil ealaa man yaly 'amrih wyewlh, 'iidha 'ursilah li'amr yqdyh la ynjh, wala yaeud ealayh bkhyr, warajul akhar salim alhwas, yanfae nafsih wghyrh, yamur bal'insaf, wahu ealaa tariq wadih la eiwaj fyh, fahal yastawi alrajulan fi nazar aleqla'? fkyf tusawwun bayn alsnm alabkm alasmm wabayn allah alqadir almuneim bikuli khyr?
